contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 29, 1970 D Tyldesley Contest (Section B)
Tyldesley Contest (Section B) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Tyldesley Contest tyldesley-contest-section-b
Formby Hall, Atherton, Lancashire Prtizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and trophy, 3rd £8 and cup. Best cornet, horn and trombone - Christ Church. Best euphonium - Wigan. 1st annual contest promoted by Tyldesley Band. 11 bands competed.
May 20, 2015, 8:08 p.m. May 18, 2016, 9:16 a.m.
1 Trinity Girls Band Harry Oakes
2 Wigan & District A. G. Mason
3 Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood
Unknown Result Bedford (Leigh) Band G. A. Littlewood
Unknown Result Central Manchester Silver P. Casson
Unknown Result Windsor Salford J. Clayton
Unknown Result Smithills Schools Senior Band Unknown
Unknown Result Bolton (Hoover) Band J. H. Denton
Unknown Result Ellenbrook & Boothstown F. Curran
Unknown Result Salford Silver J. H. Cooke
Unknown Result Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band George Roby
Unknown Result Chapel-en-le-Frith Band R. Orritt
Withdrawn Bolton Youth F. Ainsworth
